attributes.action: Workplace Tattoo and Body Modification Discrimination
attributes.additional_details:
A debate to end the discrimination of tattoos and body modifications in the work place.
I would have it that it be illegal to make an individual cover their tattoos (unless offensive) or remove body modifications (unless for food hygiene and/or safety reasons) in the workplace. Or to discriminate against an individual in any way based on tattoos or body modifications, which is let's be honest simply someones appearance!
